# RNASeqHelper

This vignette enables an RNA-seq analysis


## Input Matrices and Annotation



## Analysis


```R
tab = read_tsv(tab)
keep_genes = high_quality_genes(tab, min_occur=3, min_detect=10)
res = run_deseq(tab[keep_genes,], phenotype_data, 30, 4)
pca_and_matrices(res, out_dir="outputs/input_matrices_and_deseq")
pairwise_hmap_volcano(res$ddsObj,
                      transformed_counts = assay(res$vFalse),
                      numer = "NLS", denom = "TAF2",
                      top_ngenes_tocluster = 2000,
                      top_ngenes_tohighlight = 25,
                      lFC_zoom = 1.5, pAdj_zoom = 20,
                      kmeans = c(2,5,8),
                      out_dirprefix="outputs")
```
